snippet: Mali’s special forces rescued four United Nations employees, who hid in the hotel after Islamic extremists killed nine people, officials said.
abstract: Islamist groups attack three targets in Malian central town of Sevare for first time, killing at least 10 people.
lead_paragraph: Mali’s special forces rescued four United Nations employees, who hid in the hotel after Islamic extremists killed nine people, officials said.

headline.print_headline: Extremist Attack in Central Mali a Sign of Spreading Violence
